functionDecorators.name: getLatestETHPrice
functionDecorators.description: Returns the price of eth in usd.

functionDecorators.name: getTokenPriceInEth
functionDecorators.description: This uses the getTotalPoolValueInEth function and divides them to get the price of a single token.

functionDecorators.name: getTotalPoolValueInEth
functionDecorators.description: This returns the totalValue of our share of the pool, as well as the total supply of cbix7 tokens to calculate the price per token.
